Posts.Content: My onc put me on Percocet and compazine which helped a little but not lasting relief. My tumor marker numbers were much better with the Al's but are over 200 now. Arimidex was great in that respect but I couldn't walk, ended up using a walker. Don't want to go back that route. Its a trade off....I meet with her next week and will get scan results and next plan of action. Sending good thoughts to everyone. üôèüôèüôè
Posts.Title: How to cope ?

Posts.Content: Thanks for info I need to look into that, monthly I couldn't tolerate. The back pain was excruciating.. Same with Verzenio and highest dose. Wish they would have tried lower one. My body reacts badly to all these...
Posts.Title: Any input would help

Posts.Content: Taking xgeva for possible breast cancer mestasis to bone. Horrible side effects -- nausea and stomach pain and severe back pain. Any coping ideas? Thanks, Linda
Posts.Title: How to cope ?

Posts.Content: Hello .. Has any one had the hand/foot side effect from xeloda?? Are most of the side effects doable? I am to start this on Wednesday for breast cancer metastasis to mid thoracic spine and lungs.. Thanks, Linda
